project.name: Om for testing
project.description: Om (pronounced as "Oh m") is a free command line tool for generating stressfull text data for field testing as well as Random testing. Now no need to type characters for test data. Just enter the count & Om will generate no. of characters equal to count. The data generated can be copied anywhere using Ctrl+v (e.g. it can be copied to any field of the Application or as a Test data in Test Case file). The User can generate characters in 4 different ways using 4 modes of Om. The user can provide options to generate lowercase, uppercase, numeric, other or any combination of above 4 character types. Moreover Om comes with User Manual for complete guidance to its users.
